item.title: Report E-2025020335
item.description:
Report E-2025020335

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-26T06:20:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-11
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0350 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal XDE. It was reported that approximately 10 gallons of "Resin Solution" were released from a metal drum due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted inside trailer #3216477. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. XPO will place the waste inside of an 85-gallon metal drum. ERTS generated waste ID 227217-1. A DOT 5800 will be required. ERTS notified Chemtrec; John provided report #2025021100019.
